Gaug.es is Growing

Many were worried that with the acquisition to GitHub our products would be lost in the shuffle. We’re hoping you’ve been watching the last month of updates, and that this helps you rest easier; we’re only growing stronger. Today we’ve released both Daily Email Summaries and Browser Support Statistics, and we think they’ll blow your mind.

Daily Email Summaries

This is my favorite addition, because for those who have the self-control not to leave Gaug.es up in a window all day long (I’m not among these), you can have daily email summaries sent to you so you’re able to quickly track your stats. I know it sounds crazy, but some out there do not watch their statistics on their iPad while working (not that I know people that do, cough).

Browser Support

Browser Support gives you exactly what you need to find out what percentage of CSS, HTML5, and Javascript features your visitor’s browsers support.

For the official GitHub blog post click here. and if you don’t have a Gaug.es account? Holy smokes, get one now!
